          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["JavaScript"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "var monitor = {\n  threshold: 5,\n  check: function(value) {\n    if (value > this.threshold) {\n      this.display(\"Value is too high!\");\n    }\n  },\n  display(message) {\n    alert(message);\n  }\n};\n\nmonitor.check(7); // The value of `this` is implied by the method call syntax.\n\nvar badCheck = monitor.check;\nbadCheck(15); // The value of `this` is window object and this.threshold is undefined, so value > this.threshold is false\n\nvar check = monitor.check.bind(monitor);\ncheck(15); // This value of `this` was explicitly bound, the function works.\n\nvar check8 = monitor.check.bind(monitor, 8);\ncheck8(); // We also bound the argument to `8` here. It can't be re-specified."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 7
        }

        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550714968128,
          "id": "f5370cb9-13d0-4c09-b86f-9420555c984c",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
